title: PBE launcher error, getting unspecified error on trying to open launcher
body:
Well, I just downloaded and extracted the files to play on the PBE, but now that I'm trying to open up the launcher to install it, I get an unspecified error, and it doesn't even begin patching. Any fixes? I've already allowed both launchers through firewall and tried both of them, same error.

Here are the logs: 
> * > (   USER)[16:50:41.482] RADS::UserKernel::Application::Run: Riot Application Distribution System (c) 2010 Riot Games (version 1.0.0.228)

replies.body:
Hey HeathWard, 

You're going to need to submit a ticket so someone at Rito so they  can help you one on one. Make sure you give them as much detail as you can. Maybe include all that in a link if you can and they should fix you right up!  

Riot Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
